prompt_templates.slogan: Generate a concise, tech-forward slogan for {brandName} that emphasizes innovation, reliability, and user experience. Keep it under 6 words.
prompt_templates.description: Write a professional brand description for {brandName} in the {industry} industry. Focus on cutting-edge technology, user-centric design, and market leadership. 2-3 sentences.
prompt_templates.ad_copy: Create compelling ad copy for {brandName} that highlights technical excellence and user benefits. Include a clear call-to-action. 50-75 words.
prompt_templates.logo_prompt: minimalist logo design, geometric shapes, {brandColors.primary} and {brandColors.secondary}, clean lines, modern typography, scalable vector, professional

prompt_templates.slogan: Create an inspiring, creative slogan for {brandName} that captures artistic vision and innovation. Make it memorable and energetic.
prompt_templates.description: Write an engaging brand description for {brandName} that showcases creativity, artistic excellence, and client collaboration. Emphasize unique vision and results.
prompt_templates.ad_copy: Develop vibrant ad copy for {brandName} that inspires creativity and showcases artistic capabilities. Use energetic language with strong visual appeal.
prompt_templates.logo_prompt: creative artistic logo, dynamic composition, {brandColors.primary} gradient, expressive design, contemporary art style, memorable symbol

prompt_templates.slogan: Generate a trustworthy, professional slogan for {brandName} that conveys expertise, reliability, and client success. Focus on trust and results.
prompt_templates.description: Write a professional brand description for {brandName} that establishes authority, experience, and client-focused service. Emphasize track record and expertise.
prompt_templates.ad_copy: Create authoritative ad copy for {brandName} that builds trust and demonstrates expertise. Include client benefits and professional credentials.
prompt_templates.logo_prompt: professional logo design, traditional elements, {brandColors.primary} monogram, clean typography, corporate identity, timeless design

prompt_templates.slogan: Create a disruptive, energetic slogan for startup {brandName} that captures innovation, growth, and market disruption. Make it bold and memorable.
prompt_templates.description: Write a dynamic brand description for startup {brandName} that emphasizes innovation, rapid growth, and market transformation. Show ambition and vision.
prompt_templates.ad_copy: Develop high-energy ad copy for startup {brandName} that showcases disruption, innovation, and rapid results. Use action-oriented language.
prompt_templates.logo_prompt: dynamic startup logo, bold geometric shapes, {brandColors.primary} vibrant colors, modern typography, growth symbol, energetic design

prompt_templates.slogan: Generate a caring, trustworthy slogan for healthcare brand {brandName} that emphasizes patient care, expertise, and healing. Focus on compassion.
prompt_templates.description: Write a compassionate brand description for healthcare provider {brandName} that builds trust, shows expertise, and emphasizes patient-centered care.
prompt_templates.ad_copy: Create caring ad copy for healthcare {brandName} that builds trust and emphasizes quality patient care. Use reassuring, professional language.
prompt_templates.logo_prompt: medical healthcare logo, clean design, {brandColors.primary} calming colors, cross or healing symbol, professional typography, trustworthy
